verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on <S%H3318>me,<s%> and he brought me out in the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and set me <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and it was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

He caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> by them all <S%H5439>around:<s%> and <S%H3966>behold,<s%> there were very <S%H7227>many<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and <S%H3966>behold,<s%> they were very <S%H3002>dry.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> can these <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live?<s%> I <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H3045>know.<s%>

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5012>me,<s%> Prophesy over these <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3002>them,<s%> you dry <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> to these <S%H6106>bones:<s%> <S%H7307>Behold,<s%> I will cause breath to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H2421>you,<s%> and you shall live.

I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> on <S%H5927>you,<s%> and will bring up <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on <S%H7159>you,<s%> and cover you with <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in <S%H2421>you,<s%> and you shall live; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and as I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> there was a <S%H6963>noise,<s%> and <S%H7494>behold,<s%> an earthquake; and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> came <S%H7126>together,<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> to its <S%H6106>bone.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> <S%H1517>and,<s%> behold, there were sinews on <S%H1320>them,<s%> and flesh came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7159>covered<s%> them <S%H4605>above;<s%> but there was no breath in <S%H7307>them.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5012>me,<s%> Prophesy to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds,<s%> <S%H7307>breath,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> on these <S%H2026>slain,<s%> that they may <S%H2421>live.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7307>me,<s%> and the breath <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H2421>them,<s%> and they lived, and stood <S%H5975>up<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> an <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> these <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H559>behold,<s%> they say, Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%> <S%H8615>up,<s%> and our hope is <S%H6>lost;<s%> we are clean cut <S%H1504>off.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5971>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and cause you to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> my <S%H935>people;<s%> and I will bring you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and caused you to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> in <S%H2421>you,<s%> and you shall live, and I will <S%H3240>place<s%> you in your own <S%H127>land:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it and <S%H6213>performed<s%> <S%H5002>it,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came again to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on <S%H3063>it,<s%> For Judah, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions:<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on <S%H3130>it,<s%> For Joseph, the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and for all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions:<s%>
and <S%H7126>join<s%> them for you <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> that they may become <S%H259>one<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
When the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, Will you not show us what you mean by <S%H5046>these?<s%>

<S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H1696>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3947>Behold,<s%> I will take the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> which is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> them with <S%H6086>it,<s%> even with the stick of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
The <S%H6086>sticks<s%> whereon you <S%H3789>write<s%> shall be in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1696>Say<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3947>Behold,<s%> I will take the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where they are <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land:<s%>

and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> to them <S%H5750>all;<s%> and they shall be no more <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> neither shall they be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> kingdoms any more at <S%H4467>all;<s%>

neither shall they <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any more with their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> nor with their detestable <S%H8251>things,<s%> nor with any of their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> but I will <S%H3467>save<s%> them out of all their <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H2398>places,<s%> in which they have sinned, and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H5971>them:<s%> so shall they be my people, and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H259>them;<s%> and they all shall have one <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> they shall also <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and do <S%H6213>them.<s%>

They shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> in which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3427>lived;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H1121>therein,<s%> they, and their children, and their <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be their <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H5769>them;<s%> it shall be an everlasting <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5414>them;<s%> and I will place <S%H7235>them,<s%> and multiply <S%H5414>them,<s%> and will set my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
My <S%H4908>tent<s%> also shall be with <S%H430>them;<s%> and I will be their God, and they shall be my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
